meanings.definition: The hair of a horse, especially when used for making brushes or bows.
meanings.sent1: The artist used horsehairs to create a beautiful brush for painting.
meanings.sent2: I found some horsehairs on the ground near the stable.
meanings.sent3: The horsehairs decided to rebel and form their own art club.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as horsehairs, never giving up.
meanings.sent5: The horsehairs shimmered in the sunlight, a natural work of art.

meanings.definition: A single strand of hair from a horse.
meanings.sent1: I found a horsehair stuck to my jacket after visiting the farm.
meanings.sent2: The horsehair was so fine and delicate, like silk.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the horsehair as a tightrope to cross the road.
meanings.sent4: His patience was as thin as a horsehair, ready to snap at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The horsehair floated gently in the breeze, a tiny reminder of the majestic animal.
